entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 8.0 rc1 SDK ContainerFamily=alpine goes looking for non-existing Alpine tag #35848
  • Containers: detection of port config should prefer ASPNETCORE_URLS #35845
  • Provide feed details when erroring on unauthorized feed #35842

PullRequests

Created

  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add workload garbage collection tests for side-by-side manifests #35857
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2283650 #35854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35851
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #35849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat old TFMs as unsupported by ILLink analyzers #35837
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • SDK resolver perf: Optimize EnvironmentProvider.SearchPaths #35807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.403 #35833
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.310 #35832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.113 #35831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.416 #35830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.319 #35829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.124 #35828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35835
    untriaged
  • Pass failure message reported from from getApplyUpdateCapabilities in WASM to dotnet watch #35755
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow all SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • SDK resolver perf: Don't check current process for dotnet.exe on .NET Framework #35805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
